trigger_prototypes.expression: {nodata(1d)}=0 and {nodata(1h)}=1
trigger_prototypes.name: No data for an hour from sensor Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}

trigger_prototypes.expression: {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=99 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=99 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=99
trigger_prototypes.name: New unknown state of sensor Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}

trigger_prototypes.expression: {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].delta(24h)}>0 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].delta(24h)}>0 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].delta(24h)}>0
trigger_prototypes.name: State of sensor Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME} has been changing during last day

trigger_prototypes.expression: {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=29 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=29 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=29
trigger_prototypes.name: State of sensor Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME} is Device Disabled

trigger_prototypes.expression: {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=28 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=28 or {Chassis by IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Cable/Interconnect.{#NAME}].last()}=28
